DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study de novo renal transplant patient evaluate effect renal function optimize new regimen comparison standard everolimus exposure plus low-dose cyclosporine microemulsion regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Everolimus Combination With Cyclosporine Microemulsion de Novo Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Recipients decease , live unrelated , nonhuman leukocyte antigen ( HLA ) identical living relate donor renal transplant actually viable kidney transplant time randomization ( within 24 hour graft reperfusion ) The renal cold ischemic time must < 36 hour . The age donor must 15 65 year . Patients recipients multiple organ transplant , include one kidney Patients previously receive organ transplant fail within one year Patients current panel reactive Tcell antibody titer 50 % Patients recipients ABO incompatible transplant Tcell crossmatch positive transplant Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
